title: Why is the iPhone 12 cheaper in Dubai than India? - Quora

response.answer_text: Prices of iPhones are much higher in India compared to other parts of the world, which is mainly due to the import duties and taxes. Soon after the prices were announced, it was clear that purchasing an iPhone 12 Pro from Dubai would not only be cheaper but also help them save some money because of the added 30% tax imposed in India on those phones.

In India, you’re paying about 30% of that MRP of iPhone in taxes. (GST and import duty) You don’t have any kind of import duty for electronics in UAE and sales tax or whatever their equivalent of GST is, is around 5%. (Read some time ago, don’t know if it’s changed) So obviously it’s going to be cheaper.
